label.name: The task in this section is to explore the Mille...
label.intro:
The task in this section is to explore the Millet data introduced here. This means that we want to get to know the data: look at the data through visualisations like tables and graphs to investigate the variables that lead to big differences in the yield.

 

However you choose to explore the data, can you identify the variables that are the most important, that lead to the biggest differences? What observations can you make? Look at the variables to understand as much as possible the sources of variability â€“ which variables result in bigger differences in the yield variable? This can then help indicate what the most important variables to analyse might be.


This can then help indicate what the most important variables to analyse might be.
By understanding the variables contributing to variability, valuable insights can be gained to determine the most crucial variables for further analysis.
